input: [Aside] I am almost afraid to stand alone
response: Here in the churchyard; yet I will adventure.

input: Here in the churchyard; yet I will adventure.
response: Retires

input: Retires
response: O Lord, they fight! I will go call the watch.

input: O Lord, they fight! I will go call the watch.
response: Exit

input: Exit
response: This is the place; there, where the torch doth burn.

input: This is the place; there, where the torch doth burn.
response: First Watchman

input: First Watchman
response: The ground is bloody; search about the churchyard:

input: The ground is bloody; search about the churchyard:

input: Go, some of you, whoe'er you find attach.
response: Pitiful sight! here lies the county slain,

input: Pitiful sight! here lies the county slain,
response: And Juliet bleeding, warm, and newly dead,

input: And Juliet bleeding, warm, and newly dead,
response: Who here hath lain these two days buried.

input: Who here hath lain these two days buried.
response: Go, tell the prince: run to the Capulets:

input: Go, tell the prince: run to the Capulets:

input: Raise up the Montagues: some others search:
response: We see the ground whereon these woes do lie;

input: We see the ground whereon these woes do lie;
response: But the true ground of all these piteous woes

input: But the true ground of all these piteous woes
response: We cannot without circumstance descry.

input: We cannot without circumstance descry.
response: Re-enter some of the Watch, with BALTHASAR

input: Re-enter some of the Watch, with BALTHASAR
response: Second Watchman

input: Second Watchman
response: Here's Romeo's man; we found him in the churchyard.

response: First Watchman

input: First Watchman
response: Hold him in safety, till the prince come hither.

input: Hold him in safety, till the prince come hither.

input: Third Watchman

response: As he was coming from this churchyard side.

input: First Watchman

response: He came with flowers to strew his lady's grave;

input: He came with flowers to strew his lady's grave;
response: And bid me stand aloof, and so I did:

input: And bid me stand aloof, and so I did:
response: Anon comes one with light to ope the tomb;
